timeline.message: Add logs for locale detection exception
Add CurrencyInfo class to handle obsolete and non ISO 4217 currencies
Handle the case of exchangeRate==null when displaying the tx confirm dlg

Add more logging, set default currency based on locale for devices that
don't have sim cards.

This does not handle the case where a currency does not exist in the
price source list, but the previous commit prevents the crash.
